org.restlet.component
Interface Proxy

All Superinterfaces:
Component, Element, UniformInterface
public interface Proxy
extends Component

Intermediary component, selected by a client, providing encapsulation of other services.

"A proxy component is an intermediary selected by a client to provide interface encapsulation of other services, data translation, performance enhancement, or security protection." Roy T. Fielding

See Also:
Source dissertation
